home.title: Joan of Arc: Orléans Solo Helper
home.play1: Play against Joan, the Solo Mode opponent of Joan of Arc: Orléans.
home.play2: This helper application replaces the automa cards and the tile bag, and helps setting up the game with various difficulty levels.

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?
